attributes.action: When a uk citizen falls in love with a non-eu citizen, a visa should be issued expeditiously.
attributes.additional_details:
It is the government's view that marriage is one of the most important institutions we have got!

The above quote was made by the Home Secretary.

And yet the Government  place many unnecessary obstacles when a non-eu citizen applies for a visa to allow them to marry a UK Citizen!

When a genuine application is made for a marriage/fiancee visa from two loving people who  want to live together and share their lives because they are passionately in love with each other, money should not be an issue when allowing a successful visa application

LOVE should be the only consideration. Money should be not taken into account!

Let us return to the old-fashioned standards of yesteryear where LOVE is the only criteria for two people wishing to marry, one of whom is a non-eu citizen,

Let the Government practise what they say and prove that marriage is one of the most important institutions we have got!
